multiplechoiceresponse.label: How does an RNN update its internal state and generate a predicted output?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: By multiplying input data and weight matrices and applying a non-linearity
By randomly generating new values for the state and output
By using a recurrent function that loops back on itself
By comparing the predicted output to the true label
